content: Hello! This is the AI receptionist from XYZ Home Services. I understand you'd like help with HVAC services. May I have your name, please?
Thanks, John. Could you please provide your address so we can check service availability?
Thank you. You are within our service area. Can you please tell me your ideal time for an appointment?
To be honest, I'm really busy this month. I don't think I can schedule any time.
I understand, John. If your schedule frees up, feel free to contact us anytime. Would you like me to help with anything else today?
reason: Customer too busy to schedule appointment
